Java SE 14 & JDK 14

Uses of Class
java.awt.datatransfer.Clipboard

Packages that use Clipboard 
Package Description
java.awt
Contains all of the classes for creating user interfaces and for painting graphics and images.
java.awt.datatransfer
Provides interfaces and classes for transferring data between and within applications.
javax.swing
Provides a set of "lightweight" (all-Java language) components that, to the maximum degree possible, work the same on all platforms.

  • Uses of Clipboard in java.awt

    Methods in java.awt that return Clipboard 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    abstract Clipboard Toolkit.getSystemClipboard()
    Gets the singleton instance of the system Clipboard which interfaces with clipboard facilities provided by the native platform.
    Clipboard Toolkit.getSystemSelection()
    Gets the singleton instance of the system selection as a Clipboard object.

  • Uses of Clipboard in java.awt.datatransfer

    Methods in java.awt.datatransfer with parameters of type Clipboard 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void ClipboardOwner.lostOwnership​(Clipboard clipboard, Transferable contents)
    Notifies this object that it is no longer the clipboard owner.
    Constructors in java.awt.datatransfer with parameters of type Clipboard 
    Constructor Description
    FlavorEvent​(Clipboard source)
    Constructs a FlavorEvent object.

  • Uses of Clipboard in javax.swing

    Methods in javax.swing with parameters of type Clipboard 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void TransferHandler.exportToClipboard​(JComponent comp, Clipboard clip, int action)
    Causes a transfer from the given component to the given clipboard.
